title: My Camera History
subtitle: Click! Click! Record and share your camera journey

fileUploader.dropzone: Drop image files or folders here, or click to select

notice.unsupportedFormat: Some file formats may not be supported. JPEG format has the best compatibility.
notice.exifRequired: EXIF data is required for image analysis.
notice.unsupportedFiles: Unsupported formats or failed to extract data:

focalLengthDistribution.title: Focal Length Distribution
focalLengthDistribution.notice: * Focal lengths are converted to 35mm format equivalent

usedCameras.title: Used Cameras
usedCameras.placeholder: Camera usage chart and details will be displayed here.
usedCameras.noVisibleCameras: No cameras to display. Upload images or adjust exclusion settings.
usedCameras.noDataForChart: No camera data available for chart.

footer.privacy: All image processing and EXIF data analysis are performed entirely within your browser. No images or extracted data are transmitted anywhere.

footer.basedOn: This app is based on <1>Snap Scope</1> by shj.
